text.page:
431
102-216a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga'i gnas na nor bu rin po che'i dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang / glog gi phreng ba dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug phud can dang / gtsug phud 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po can dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin tu brtan pa dang / mgul na nor bu dang / sprin byung dang / char rgyun dang / rab 'joms dang / rnam par 'joms dang / mthu bsgyings dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs zab dang / klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang / rnam par sgra 'byin dang / ut+pal dang / rtsal chen dang / gshol mda' 'dzin dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / kun tu snang dang / rna rtsub dang / dung dang / dar dar dang / klu'i rgyal po u pa dar dar dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag

432
102-216b 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang / srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / dung thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen rna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / glog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / chu stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / baidUr+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog sgra dang / gser 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang / 'char ba dang / bal glang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal pa dang / ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / mgo stong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang / sprin chen dang / sde bzang dang / sa skyong dang / mis byin dang / rnam par dul dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i gdong dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po rgyur gdug dang / pad+ma ka dang / mjug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga po dang / bal li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug rings dang / mgo bo che dang / pim pi ka dang / bi tar dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / stong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / mig bzang dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shul can dang / rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu srin sprin chen po dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas 'thung dang / sprin zla dang / rgya

433
102-217a mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen dang / ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / kha ba can dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / khro med dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpal dang / chu 'dzin dang / sprin gdugs dang / ing gi ra'i gdong dang / gzi brjid can dang / sprin las mngon byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyad lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gser ngad can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug can dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'khrugs sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / 'brug sgrogs dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bla ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i lda ldi dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang /

434
102-217b klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag /bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che

435
102-218a thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ / yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /thams cad kun du snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa sangs rgyas la nges par gyur ba'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin

436
102-218b gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang ba brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri

437
102-219a rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog snang ba ltar sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / a nad rnyil dang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / a nad rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan gyi pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar bar thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing ljon pa lta bu rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho

438
102-219b sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / me tog dang / pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs ba'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang / phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas rgyan nyi ma snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /yid

439
102-220a bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / a nad rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi dra ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po che bcu'i 'od snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor

440
102-220b bu thams cad kyi sdong po yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po snang bar byed pa'i kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ / ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /

441
102-221a nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ / ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin

442
102-221b ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad mo'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ /de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so/ /de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/

443
102-222a bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/ rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab

444
102-222b tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byams pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mes mi tshig /mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po lha dang mi byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go/ /klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/ rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal dang lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do/ /klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ d+hA ra NI d+hA ra NI/ ut+tA ra Ni/ sam pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya bar+Na/ sat+ya pra ti dz+nyA sa ra ha/ dz+nyA na pa ti/ ud de bA da ni pi nA ma ni/ a b+hi She tsa ni/ a b+hi byA hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a dzi ma tu/

445
102-223a e hi kum ba la ni/ ba ha hA ra klai sha na/ d+hu na pA paM/ sho d+ha ya marga Na/ ni ra ti ka /d+harma ta shud+d+ha/ lo ka bi ti mi ra ra tsas/ duHkha sha ma na sarba bud+d+ha/ a ba lo ka na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bra dz+nyA dz+nyA na b+he swA hA/ klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa chos kyi sku la 'jug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya brjod par bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyi brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul pa snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang / rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya yid la bya'o/ /de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams cad dang / klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba'i sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam

446
102-223b par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugasal phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun du ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag

447
102-224a 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ut+pal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

448
102-224b ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char bu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyems pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thong sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyis kun tu 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa 'dzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skyed par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang 'tshe ba dang

449
102-225a gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/ gang dag klu thams cad la skul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang / rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char ba'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/ /klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs pa rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed/ char ches ba gcod/

450
102-225b 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams cad skul bar byed/ lha thams cad sim par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do/ /tad+ya thA/ ma hA dz+nyA na/ a ba b+hA sa ni/ shrI to dzo lak+Sh+ma dr-iSh+Ta bi kra ma/ badzra saM ha ta ne/ pa ra ma pi rA dza/ nirma la gu Na ge tu swA r+ya bra b+he/ bi ma lAng+ga yaSh+Ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/ du dumU/ ha na ha na/ ma hA pra b+he bid+hU ta ma hA mo ha aM d+ha ka re/ pra dz+nyA gra shud+d+he/ pa ri bU ra Na mai tre/ mai tri bi ra ma na skan+d+ha/ mai trai ma bud+d+ha re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa lA ma bud+d+ha re/ bo d+h+yad+ga ku su med sha ba le/ tsa tur bai shA ra d+ye/ aSh+Ta da sha a be ni ka bud+d+ha d+harme/ shu b+ha ma ti/ buN+ya rA shi/ shukla d+harma sa ma n+wi ti/ gam+b+hi re/ gam+b+hi re/ bi ra dzaske/ bi ma lo/ /bi she Sha/ prA ba te/ ni rA pra b+ha d+harme/ sarba lo ka dz+yeSh+Tha dz+yeSh+Tha/ pa ra bra ba re/ a nut+ta re/ a sang+ge/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ shAn+ta ma te/ shAn+ta ma te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ bar ma bud+d+hA nu mi te/ ma hA pra dz+pA pA ra mi te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal bar bya'o/ /s+yAd ya the da na/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ nA gA nAM/ dza ba dza ba/ dzi bi dzi bi/ dzu bu dzu bu/ klu chen po dag tshur sheg /sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig /tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur sheg /kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig sa/

451
102-226a ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas klu thams cad dgug par bya'o/ /byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang bsam pa chen pos klu'i bdag po dag tshur sheg /sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig /b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ chu chen po'i chu dang sprin gyi chu 'chang ba can lag gis 'gro ba chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg /ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig /g+ha Da g+ha Da/ g+hi Di g+hi Di/ g+hu Du g+hu Du/ drag shul can khro ba shugs chen po dang ldan pa dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa tshur sheg /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig swA hA/ ta Ta ta Ta/ ti Ti ti Ti/ tu Tu tu Tu/ nor bu chen po'i cod pan thogs pa dang ldan pa sbrul gdug pa'i gzugs can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs dran par gyis la rdo rje 'chang gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig swA hA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa sprin chen po brtsegs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba rnams tshur sheg /byams pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis lag na rdo rjes bsgo ba/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gi 'gro thams cad khyed rnams gnyid med par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pas/ g+ha ma g+ha ma/ g+hi mi g+hi mi/ g+hu mu g+hu mu swA hA/ klu thams cad dgug go/ /

452
102-226b byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/ na ra na ra/ ni ri ni ri/ nu ru nu ru swA hA/ yon po sna tshogs su gyur ba'i mgo stong pa mgo dang / mig dmar ba stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dkug bar bya'o/ /kye kye lag gis 'gro chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs dran par gyis shig /ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/ gu Du gu Du swA hA/ stobs dang pha rol gnod pa dang gzi brjid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams phob cig /sha ra sha ra/ shi ri shi ri/ shu ru shu ru swA hA/ kye kye klu chen po rnams rang rang gi rigs dang cho rigs dran par gyis la/ ma shol bar lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun phob cig swA hA/ tshangs pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ brgya byin gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag brgyad po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang byin gyis

453
102-227a brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ lha thams cad kyi bden pas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ klu thams cad kyi bden pas sa chen po 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bden pas sems can thams cad srung shig swA hA/ dri za thams cad kyi bden pas mi rnams kyi 'khrug pa dang gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi bden pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa thams cad rnam par zlog shig swA hA/ nam mkha' lding thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cad byams par byos la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char chen po'i rgyun phob cig swA hA/ mi'am ci thams cad kyi bden pas sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig swA hA/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bden pas yangs shing rgya che ba'i char gyi rgyun phob cig swA hA/ 'dir char la sgrib pa lnga po dag yang dag par zung shig swA hA/ mi thams cad kyi bden pas mi thams cad la yongs su srung shig swA hA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ da ra da ra/ di ri di ri/ du ru du ru/ na Ta na Ta/ ni Ti ni Ti/ nu Tu nu Tu/ shin tu mgyogs par bzhud ma/ sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/ sprin ldan ma/ sprin chen ldan ma/ sprin chen chu 'dzin ma/ sprin gsal ma/ sprin 'byung ma/ dus sprin ma/ sprin gyi 'byung gnas ma/ sprin sgrogs ma/ sprin bzhugs ma/ sprin gyi cod pan ldan ma/ sprin gyi phreng ba mnga' ma/ sprin gyis rnam par brgyan ma/ sprin bcibs ma/ sprin la gnas bcas ma/ sprin gyi snying po'i sprin gyi ral pa can/ sprin 'od ma/ sprin gyi 'khor ldan ma/ rgya chen sprin bzhugs ma/ mchod phyir sprin thogs ma/ lo tog 'ongs sgrub ma/ ri su la na bzhugs ma/ klu'i yum bcom ldan 'das ma/ sprin chen dpal ldan skar mdog can/ bsil reg ma/ tshub ma chen po spyod yul ma/

454
102-227b klu chen rnam par rol mdzad ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma/ pon tra bcud kyis len drug 'dzin ma/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu dbab tu gsol swA hA/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ g+hi ri ni/ g+hi ri ni/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma ri/ dbu dgu dang ldan ma/ sprin phreng ldan ma/ glog tshogs phreng ldan ma/ lag gis 'gro thams cad 'dzin ma/ sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs ma/ dug drag po thams cad spyod yul ma/ sprin bkod pa la bcibs ma/ 'brug sgrogs ma/ sgra sgrogs ma/ klu tshogs la skul ma/ lha mo sprin chen phreng ldan ma/ klu thams cad la ma shol bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig ces bskul du gsol swA hA/ ya ra ya ra/ yi ri yi ri/ yu ru yu ru/ dza ra dza ra/ dzi ri dzi ri/ dzu ru dzu ru/ dz+ha ra dz+ha ra/ gu Du gu Du/ gu gu Du/ ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/ ha ra ha ra/ hi li hi li/ mu lu mu lu/ ta la ta la/ ti li ti li/ tu lu tu lu/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ marda marda/ bra marda/ pra bar sha big+ha naM/ mai tre yAdz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bu bud+d+he/ bu bud+d+he/ ha ra bA ba~M/ sarba sa twA nAM/ a d+hiSh+The ya ba/ N+ya ma/ sarba bud+d+hAnAM/ d+ha ri ni d+ha re/ shu b+ha ma te/ gu NA gra prA pa Ne/ ma hA dz+nyA+e na la ge/ shukla d+harma sat+ya pa ti dz+nye/ ma hA yA nA d+huSh+Thi trai lo ka dz+yeSh+Tha b+ha ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha mai tri/ A pU ra ya sarba k+She trA ni/ shu kle shwe tA ma/ ba ra da re/ pan+ta ra ba si ni/ d+hu d+hu re/ d+hu d+hu ru/ sha ma sha ma/ shA n+ta ma nA sI/ char gyi bgegs thams cad rnam par bsal bar gsol swA hA/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag pa brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi thugs skyon med pas klu chen po rnams la yang dag par bskul lo/ /klu'i rgyal po chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod

455
102-228a pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swa hA/ /klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ /klu'i rgyal po btang bzung la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ /klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nu ta la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal bzangs la yang dag par bskul lo/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po glog gi phreng ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu chen po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling

456
102-228b 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu thogs la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug phud can la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ nA gi nA ge/ ma hA nA ge/ g+ho ra ma na se nA ga hr-i da ya/ du mA ku le/ u gro ro She pra tsaN+Da te dze/ bi Sho gre/ a She bi she/ a hi go re/ kr-iSh+Na pid+ga le/ tsany+tsa le/ lo la dzi he/ ma hA pha Na ka re/ ka lA pA she/ rau dra bA se naM/ Du Du ma be g+ha na g+ha na/ shi ki ni/ ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma hA ga Na ga Ni/ pa ra pa ra/ pi ri pi ri/ pu ru pu ru/ bispUrdza ne/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA b+ho ge/ ma Ni da re/ phi ri phi ri/ phu ru phu ru/ pha ra pha ra/ bar+Sha bar+Sha/ dza lAm+bu da re/ sham+bu sham+bu/ ba ta tu Tu ma me/ d+huM d+huM/ d+huM d+huM pe/ me g+ha pra b+he/ me g+ha b+ha hi ni/ D+ha ka D+ha ka /D+ha ka D+hu D+hu m+be/ g+ha nA g+ha nA/ shi ki ni/ ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma hA nA ga ga ne/ ni ra trAN+Tu/ badzra darka ri ma hA nA d+hi da ye/ g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma pa yA sti ka /dzAM gi ri b+hu dzaM ga me/ bi ka Ta sang+ka Te/ go ra bi s+phU rdza ni/ bi dzr-im+b+ha ne/ klu thams cad dgug go/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ na maHsarba bud+d+he b+h+yaHsid+d+h+ya n+tu/ man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya pa las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //cho ga ni char cher dbab par 'dod na bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla re sngon po bre ba dan sngon pho dbyang ngo / /chos

457
102-229a smra ba lus bkrus la yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas shing gos gtsang ma sngon po bgos la/ spos dri zhim pos bskus nas zas dkar gsum zos la stan sngon po'i steng du 'dug nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas sprin chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklag par bya'o/ /chu sngon pos bkang ba'i bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /gtor ma dang bdug pa dang me tog ci nus kyis sbyar ro/ /de la chos smra bas phyogs bzhir ba'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar bya ste/ shar phyogs su khru gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa ba'i lci bas bri bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs su khru bdun tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su khru dgu tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ / chos smra ba rang gi lus bsrungs la byams pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab la klu rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste 'di ni cho ga'o/ / gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe sprin chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun tshun chad gdon mi za bar char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho ni dus las yol yang srid kyi/ thub pa chen po'i gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang / yon tan la gnas te 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / sha dang nya sha la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'o thug dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras chan bu ram can la sogs pa dang / mngar

458
102-229b gsum za zhing bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar na 'grub par 'gyur te thub pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa bzhin du the tshom med par bya'o/ /'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //
